DOC.detailed_description: A three arm open , randomized interventional study order compare impact low carbohydrate diet different protein fat ratio versus standard balance diet BMI metabolic parameter obese adolescent . Study design : The study include 12 week intervention follow 9 month follow , March 2005 February 2006 . Participants randomly allocate one three diet group . Group 1 : Low carbohydrate , low fat , protein rich diet contain 1200 kcal day , 60-gr carbohydrate ( 20 % ) , 40-gr fat ( 30 % ) , 150-gr protein ( 50 % ) . Group 2 : Low carbohydrate fat rich diet contain 1200 kcal day , 60-gr carbohydrate ( 20 % ) , 80-gr fat ( 60 % ) , 60-gr protein ( 20 % ) . Group 3 : A balanced low fat diet contain 1200 kcal day , 150 - 180-gr carbohydrate ( 50 - 60 % ) , 40-gr fat ( 30 % ) , 60-gr protein ( 20 % ) . All participant receive menu detailed instruction accord group . During intervention participant attend weekly session dietitian psychologist test measure schedule time point perform ( see Measures section ) . In session participant request fill-out self report food dairy . All receive general recommendation exercise physical activity . At end intervention period ( 12th week ) , participant give instruction balance maintenance diet follow year . measure : Anthropometric assessment ( weight , height , waist circumference ) include baseline weekly measurement 12- week intervention , thereafter every three month 9-months follow-up . Body composition evaluate baseline 12- week intervention , overnight fast bioimpedance analysis ( BIA ) . Resting energy expenditure ( REE ) assess baseline 12- week intervention , morning overnight fasting mean indirect calorimetry . Urine collect every week intervention period assay ketone protein level .
